metadata.title: CVE-2023-5182 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Sensitive data could be exposed in logs of subiquity version 23.09.1 andearlier. An attacker in the adm group could use this information to findhashed passwords and possibly escalate their privilege.

criterions.comment: subiquity: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
